item.title: Tinker With Purpose
item.description: Photo by Sigmund on Unsplash The word _Tinker _is defined as: To repair, adjust, or work with something in an unskilled or experimental manner Early in my career as a Software Engineer, I had a conversation with one of my first mentors that went something like this: Mentor: “You’re a tinkerer, you know” Me: “Why yes, I suppose I am” Mentor: “Tinkering can be bad, unless you’re tinkering with purpose.
